mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY product_regidate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( product_idx, product_type, product_category, membership_count, membership_period, product_name, product_description, product_img, product_price) VALUES (bodycoding_seq.nextval, #{product_type}, #{product_category}, #{membership_count}, #{membership_period}, #{product_name},#{product_description},#{product_img},#{product_price})
mapper.select: SELECT product_detail_idx,PD.gym_code, PD.product_idx,product_type,product_category,product_name,product_status,product_stock,product_price FROM member M INNER JOIN product_detail PD ON M.gym_code=PD.gym_code INNER JOIN product P ON P.product_idx=PD.product_idx WHERE mem_id='admin_sub1'
